nodes.text: Ot'ona was a female Twi'lek who held the rank of private within the Republic Army, serving on the planet Balmorra during the Galactic War. She distributed armor to other Republic forces at Farnel Outpost.

Ot'ona appeared in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, released by BioWare in 2011, as an Armor Vendor for Republic players on Balmorra. With the release of Game Update 4.0 on October 20, 2015, Ot'ona was removed from the game along with the rest of the Armor Vendors.
